welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pequannock, a charming town known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and delight in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines including United Airlines and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to several major airlines including Delta Air Lines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights and is home to several major airlines including Air Canada and Lufthansa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a valid email address is required to access it.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights operated by major airlines such as American Airlines, JetBlue, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines including Southwest, Spirit, and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.
